div.p: Hi I I'm Donna McCabe I'm an academic advisor in the ACCESS program at DeSales University
and I wanted to talk to you about the educational technology
and it being a integral part of the learning experience here
at DeSales especially for access students.
We have three locations on campus that house computers for student use,
right here in the lounge of the University Center we have 6 computers
that are available various hours throughout the academic year.
The largest computing center is in the academic computing center in Dooling Hall
and there are 70 computers available for student use.
WE also have 2 additional computer labs in Trextler Library,
the large lab holds 33 computers and the small lab holds 15,
for hours that vary throughout the academic year you can contact our IT department
It is very important to be exposed to technology to have success in your courses here at DeSales.
